articles.description: The lawsuit alleges that Valve Inc. is abusing Steam "by creating an artificial barrier to entry" for game developers.
articles.content: Valve Inc. finds another lawsuit on its desk as a putative class action filed earlier this week alleges that the video gaming giant is abusing Steam by requiring developers to sell their games at the… [+1788 chars]
